thought: To craft blaze_powder, I need to place a blaze_rod on the crafting table. The blaze_rod is located at slot 27, so I will move it to slot 1 on the crafting table.
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that the blaze_powder has been crafted, I can move it from the crafting table to my inventory. I will move both items to slot 11, which is currently empty.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2
